text: Iñigo González de Heredia Aranzábal (born 15 March 1971 in Gasteiz) is a Spanish former professional racing cyclist. He participated three times in a Grand Tour, but only finished the 1995 Vuelta a Espana, where he finished in 70th place. ==Major results== ;1991 : 3rd Vuelta a Zamora ;1996 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships ;1997 : 1st Stage 1b (TTT) Vuelta a La Rioja ;1998 : 1st Memorial Manuel Galera ==References== ==External links== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists
title: Iñigo González de Heredia
